results.abstract: The sequel to the 2017 hit finds Diana Prince, a.k.a. Wonder Woman, pining for love and saddled with a movie unworthy of her.

results.title: George Clooney on ‘The Midnight Sky’ and Donald Trump
results.abstract: His new movie is on Netflix, but the actor-director says theaters won’t go away and Hollywood will be fine. He’s not so sure about Washington.

results.title: How Pixar’s ‘Soul’ Animates Jazz
results.abstract: A look at the ways filmmakers and musicians collaborated to present an accurate view of players’ artistry.

results.title: Carey Mulligan Won’t Let Hollywood Off the Hook
results.abstract: The actress delivered the performance of her career in the dark comedy “Promising Young Woman.” Then came those with their tired views of women.

results.title: Can We Talk About the Mom in ‘A Christmas Story’?
results.abstract: The woman hasn’t had a hot meal in 15 years and she’s always cooped up at home. 2020 is the year to give this character from a classic holiday movie her due.

results.title: A ‘Great Cultural Depression’ Looms for Legions of Unemployed Performers
results.abstract: With theaters and concert halls shuttered, unemployment in the arts has cut deeper than in restaurants and other hard-hit industries.

results.title: ‘The Dissident’ Review: A Murder for Power
results.abstract: Bryan Fogel’s new documentary about the killing of Jamal Khashoggi underlines the disregard for human rights when money and geopolitics are at play.

results.title: ‘Promising Young Woman’ Review: Courting Dangerous Liaisons
results.abstract: Carey Mulligan stars in this feminist revenge thriller that too often backs away from its potentially searing setup.

results.title: Barbara Windsor, Beloved British TV and Film Star, Dies at 83
results.abstract: She went from bubbly sex symbol in the “Carry On” films to working-class hero on “EastEnders.” Her private life was often as troubled as her “EastEnders” character’s.
